title: Fort Smith National Historic Site: Word Search Puzzles
body: Word Search Puzzles       Download these free, printable word search puzzles (PDFs) for personal or classroom use. You will need Adobe Acrobat Reader to access these files.   Law and Order in Fort Smith (Difficulty level: easy ) Law and Order in Fort Smith (Difficulty level: Medium) Law and Order in Fort Smith (Difficulty level: Hard)  Law and Order in Fort Smith  (Difficulty level: Hard - Answer Key)
